posts.title: June 24th
posts.text: Engineering Innovation starts. 2800 N Charles StBaltimore, MD 21218Unites States This is the first day in Johns Hopkins University Engineering Innovation. I have taken an UA flight (UA 199) from Shanghai in June 22nd and arrive LAX at June 22nd 16:31(LA local time); after wait for 5h48min we finally get departure from LAX at 22:55. After a nearly 5h flight trip I finally arrived Baltimore in June 23rd! The first day of EI is quite good. Today professor Luana Scheffer give us an experiment assignment in the morning, which is basically fix up the apparatus to prepare for Tension test of different spaghetti. Me and two female working partners set up the apparatus quickly and successfully and it is actually quite fun. In the afternoon, Miss Luana teach us some basic knowledges about material engineering. Stress, Strain, Young��s modulus… I am familiar with about a half of them from the Cambridge A-level Physics textbook, which is taught by Mr. Eric in my school. However, I am not familiar with some brand-new knowledge like Toughness, Yielding, Strength in bending and several relationship formulas. Moreover, I have also learned a new unit: psi, which represents pounds per square. It is almost the same with the unit Pascal, but since Chinese use neither pounds nor inch in our daily life, I feel quite interesting when I first know what is ��psi�� represents, since I have seen them on the bag of Lay��s potato chips. To me, the most challenging part is the new relationship formula I get. The constants and the position of each parameters in the fractions takes time for me to remember. The most unfortunate part in today��s activities is that our group��s spaghetti structure for holding a cotton sugar get collapsed just before the time is up (about 1 or 2 seconds before professor Luana calls ��times up!��). We are given some tape, 20 spaghetti sticks and a cotton thread to create our structure. We can win if the accident doesn��t happens! Really looking forward to tomorrow��s class! Kevin, Shi Kaiwen

巴尔的摩，马里兰州，美国；夏校就这样开始了。 今天是在JHU EI的第一天。在坐了总共快十五个小时的飞机以后，终于是在昨天早上到达了巴尔的摩。 穿过高楼林立的市中心来到校区，其实也并没有发现什么特别的地方。和许多美国学校一样，校园里有着历史非常悠久的教学楼，这一点可以从斑驳的外墙和楼梯上因为经年累月的踩踏所导致的凹陷就可以看出来。校园里的绿化覆盖率很高，错落有致的教学楼让我感觉像是来到了乡间的别墅区。今天老师上午带领我们做了一些为将来要做的测量不同的意大利面的张力承受能力的实验的一些准备工作。和我一个小组的是两位女生，一位非洲裔巴尔的摩本地高中生，还有一位中国籍但在麻省读美高的同胞。我们很快就搞定了所有的准备工作，非常开心。 下午基本上就是 Professor Luana关于material engineering的lecture。这其中比如杨氏模量等一些知识我已经在学校里As Level 物理课中早就学过，因此不论是在回答教授的问题上还是在做相关的联系上都显得得心应手。但是仍然有许多全新的之前不知道或是称谓不同的知识。对我来说，今天课程最难的一部分似乎就在于记住几个全新的关系式。此外我们还尝试了利用一段胶带纸，一条棉线和20根意大利通心粉来制作一个可以支撑住一团棉花糖的重量的同时高度能达到最高的结构。非常不幸的是就在我们结构完成前两秒支撑结构中的一根意大利面掉了出来。很不幸，我们的结构垮塌了。大概这就是今天唯一的遗憾吧。 相信明天的课程会更精彩哦！ 石凯文

Excel工作表，意大利面实验和神奇的韩国教授。 今天是EI上课的第二天。今天早上教授先教授了一些关于excel的基本操作。作为excel界的文盲，虽然教授只是在介绍一些比基本操作还要基本的基操（比如拖动文本框快速生成一列递增的数，利用公式快速生成一列数据的对应数据），我还是被秀到了。更可耻的事情是，第一个小练习输入圆体积公式的时候居然因为π数值后面没有加运算括号结果报错半天找不出错误。妈的，这还像是一个以后想学cs的人吗…… 上午也是我们今天的一个作业是给我们一张表，表里有二十个名字胡诌但是数据可能是真的的大学。数据包含了这些大学的一些统计数据，比如录取新生SAT分数的上下四分位数、录取率、本科生六年的毕业率，以及小班化率等等。我们需要根据自己的判断对大学的这些相关统计数据加权评分，最终给出一份这二十个大学的排名。在一通眼花缭乱的操作以后，我成功的得到了一张完美的排名表。根据老师提供的信息来看，我的排名里第一名是加州理工。嗯，挺符合我的身份。 下午的课就是用昨天早上粘好的一堆粗细不一的意大利面做一些弹力、张力测试之类的。不幸的事情是我们已经组装好的一根最粗的和另一根最细的意大利面直接被搞断了。当然，实验还是能照常进行，数据还是照样能收集齐（因为我们做了四组设备只要三组数据）。在北京美高女、巴尔的摩本地女和我的通力合作下，我们很快就完成了实验并且获得了极精准的数据。不得不提一提意大利面的张量和弹力，实验数据的结果让我当即失去了这辈子有生之年再尝试通心粉的念想。 在今天的正常课程结束之后我还去参加了一个韩国教授关于生物工程的一节special lecture。这个在韩国上大学在UCLA读研究生在Harvard做研究项目现在在JHU当副教授的韩国女性着实是个狠人。他的讲座彻底改变了我对生物工程这门学科的看法：电子工程、机械工程、生物学，这些都是一个在生物工程领域工作的人（比如这位开发了可以搞定癌症病人体内癌细胞机器的猛人教授）所必备的知识。幸亏不学生物。 在深夜中，期待明天的到来。 石凯文

posts.title: June 25th
posts.text: Excel, Spaghetti test, and the special lecture. Today is the 2nd day in Engineering Innovation. In the morning class professor Luana introduces us some basic operating technique of excels. Since I am a new fish on excel, although organizing data, performing calculation and visualization is just the most basic function that excel provide, I am so supervised about that. We then get some small exercises which helps me to be familiar with, for example, how to drag values so that I can get a consecutive data set quickly and how to use the formula appropriately so that it can help me to save so much time on calculating the data I need with paper and pen. We then have an assignment, which is a list of 20 hypothetical colleges and 12 pieces of data. Our task is to come out a ranking system with our own logarithms that reflects what I consider most important in a college. By giving different weights to different data, I successfully come out a big chart and a perfect table with universities’ ranking and their marks on it. In the afternoon, we go back to our lab (actually we are in the Computer lab this morning when finishing the “university ranking system” task) where we prepared spaghetti device yesterday for testing different spaghettis’ tensions and bending. Unfortunately, 1 spaghetti and 1 “angel hair” (the thinnest spaghetti) prepared yesterday for testing tensions have already broken. However, Annie, Aysia and me have down perfect experiments. We get the data we want accurately in such a short period of time. One thing that is annoying me that the small steel ball used as weight is just fading, which made my hand turns almost totally black after we finished our experiment. I also went to a special lecture this afternoon, which is related to biomedical engineering. The lecturer, Ms. Soojung Claire Hur, has a legendary study experience and she works so hard that she left her steps in a Korea university, UCLA and Harvard. Now she is currently an Assistant Professor in JHU. Her speech refreshes my idea about biomedical engineering. Biomedical engineering is like a combination of electrical engineering, mechanical engineering and Biology, which requires much more hard work than many other subjects like pure electrical engineering. Really looking forward to tomorrow’s class! Kevin/Shi Kaiwen

数据整理及分析，初始单位和二维单位之间的转换，社科话题交流大概是EI已经开始了第三天的缘故，一切开始变得熟悉；总是一成不变的餐食让人开始感到厌倦。每天早上都是一样的伙食。鸡蛋，每天换一样的肉类（第一天培根，第二天大香肠，今天小香肠），和每天换一种烧法的土豆。是的，我开始严重怀疑中午的披萨是不是用了早上没有吃完的香肠，开始怀疑每天晚上都一定比中午平均颜色深一倍的芝士面包是不是在下午进行了峰会轮转的淬火。不知道接下来的二十多天，该吃什么过下去。 今天早上的课程着实平平常常——在computer lab里开始提前做截止日期这周五的，昨天做的material test的数据整理与分析。Excel 就像个调皮的孩子，总是把我的数据在xy轴之间换来换去，让我总是得不到想要的图表；我就想那过分溺爱孩子却没什么文化的父亲，总是找不到方法来制止Excel的调皮；这个实验数据分析的作业着实很多，以至于到今天深夜我都还没有做完。 下午本来该正常在Maryland Hall 进行的lecture因为着火移到了Hudson Hall大概是今天平淡的一天里为数不多的亮点了吧。单位和纬度的课程也是简简单单，就这样浑浑噩噩的过了半个下午。 说到special lecture，今天这位讲座嘉宾可是带来了诚意满满的干货。作为一名仍在学习研究Continuum Mechanics的JHU学生，他简单介绍了张量（tensor）的概念，并阐述了张量在计算材料应力、拉伸程度以及计算杨氏模量中的应用。看起来，所有的special lecture的演讲嘉宾，或是说整个JHU的工院，都在能够服务该校王牌——生物医疗领域的相关工程技术学科上有着极为丰厚的学术资源以及极强的竞争力。纯计算机或是纯电子工程，不存在的。晚上吃完饭绕学校走了一圈，大概3.5公里吧，校园环境真的好美。回到寝室后与室友进行了一番激烈的交流。很遗憾，室友认为我在中国的生活极度无聊无趣，因为我们没有Youtube/Netflix/Facebook……当我试图向他说明中国有这些替代品，中国人的娱乐生活很丰富且中国的食物更健康好吃，中国的犯罪率很低之前，他似乎只有一个印象，那就是他身为自由灯塔下的自由民，享受着所谓的“新闻自由”。 不知道该怎么叫醒一个沉睡在自己梦中的人。

posts.title: June 24th
posts.text: Today is quite a normal day. Nothing special today except for the fire news about the Maryland Hall. We did part of our material experiment data analysis in the computer lab this morning (unfortunately I am still not finished now (23:46now)) and we studied units and dimensions in the afternoon, which is quite easy. The special lecture is held by a JHU student who studied in Continuum Mechanics, which is another subject that has a partial relationship with biomedical field, which is JHU most good at. Seems like every special lecturer belong to engineering department and they are doing or studying everything related to biomedical engineering. I have even seen a 3D surgical machine in the Hackernet building, in which our computer lab locates in. I walked around the school individually this afternoon to discover the beautiful scenes in Homewood campus, which looks very good and I take a lot of photos of the campus. I also discussed about China’s social media freedom with Gov(I don’t know why he suddenly discuss this with me) tonight. What he always believing is that US has news freedom while China don’t; Chinese people are boring because they can’t use neither YouTube or Netflix. He is even thinking that it is the American people that feed up Japan’s economy. He just believe that Chinese people are under control. I just have no idea how to wake up such a man who only lives inside of his personal opinion and never change it. Really tired at night!
6.27 现在还在做明天必须交的实验报告……果然，截止时间才是第一生产力。今天的饭真的难吃。不说了过两天回来补坑先去补作业坑了。

posts.title: June 28th
posts.text: Yes. Now it is already June 29th night 11:00PM and now I am sitting in front of my desk writing things about things happened yesterday! Yesterday actually there is nothing really special. We done our lab report for remote measurement and I am just uploading it！！！I am gonna lose huge marks on that. Bull shit! We just do some exercise for Monday’s quizzes in the afternoon. I slept so early last night. My brain stops working yesterday!!!
这一天没什么特别的。上午写测量两栋大楼楼顶间距离的report（操老子今天晚上才交完蛋死亡），下午做了一点周一测试的ppq。怎么办，昨天睡的太早什么正经事情没做，完蛋了。
华盛顿 哥伦比亚特区，美国。<–!more–>今天去了华盛顿，人生第一次去灯塔国首都。这首都小小的而且也有地方看起来蛮荒凉的，有一点地方也像乡下的北京。我们今天去了自然历史博物馆和宪法纪念博物馆，看到了华盛顿纪念碑和白宫。可惜特朗普不在家啊没法进去拜访。华盛顿的街头甚至能听到汉语，还是倍感亲切啊。今天好累，明天再来补吧
June 27th. Still fighting with the lab report for tomorrow! Of course deadline is the strongest power to push me up. Finish this writing in few days.

posts.title: June29th
posts.text: Washington D.C. <–!more–>We went to Washington D.C. today. This is the first time I have ever been to Washington D.C. It is quite a small capital which I think only has administrative function as a capital of US (Office where federal level government department locates in). I went to Washington Monument, The archive Museum, the White House and the Natural History museum. It was quite fun.

posts.title: July 6th
posts.text: July 6th. The inner Harbor. The second Saturday in Baltimore (although actually I am only able to enjoy 3 Saturday here, which means a lot time passed!). We simply stayed at our dorm whole morning, and we went to The Inner Harbor in the afternoon. 4 of us travel as a group took a small boat to travel on the water to see the Inner Harbor, which spend us 25$. The Inner Harbor has quite a long history, which can be observed from the old 19th century aircraft carrier mooring inside the Inner Harbor. The Inner Harbor doesn’t have many places to visit or to play. We went to several shoe stores and I found that the same AJ13 is 50$ cheaper at the Gallery than that in the shoe store. I think myself really lucky because I didn’t buy it from shoe store which saves 50$, but the staff says they don’t have my size. What a pity! For other shoes, either too ugly or no my size. We went to a book store then and bought some sale books, which is quite cheap ($5 for 1 book but tax 6%). One is This Side of Paradise by F. Scott Fitzgerald and another is the picture of Dorian Gray by Oscar Wilde. Both of them write in English, which is the reason why I bought these two books. Followed the tradition, I bought a Baltimore City map, which cost me about 7.4$, much higher then the book’s price!

posts.title: June30th
posts.text: Study and sleep; stay at dorm for almost a day, playing with cellphones and prepare for tomorrow’s exams. Play basketball with 2 friends and some Indian people. Another Chinese adult also playing. They are so strong and one high Indian is really accurate, as same as that Chinese adult. Badminton court also here, I want to play it tomorrow.
今天在寝室里当了一天肥宅。上午基本就在看手机，下午稍微准备了下考试然后去打会儿篮球。跟朋友和一个中国人还有三四个印度人一起打。对位的印度人好强壮。这里还有羽毛球场，不说了明天找机会打羽毛球去了。
七月的第一天好哦！ 上周总共花了135美刀。不行，得省点钱，顺便明天开始背单词哦。 今天早上考了个试，下午上了一节static lecture。 Static好难！我到现在还没看懂这个诡异的桥的受力分析图。今天早上一脸自信去考试没想到考的这么痿。靠！不能划水了。 话说今日香港。嗯，回归二十二周年，变与不变，乱与不乱，究竟是谁？

今天真的是上了一整天魔幻现实主义的课……早上先是在一个巨大无比的教室里面上了课。教授大致是位印度人，留着IT人士常见的智慧发型并且穿着格子衬衫。最骚的是还有一点点竖起来的小刘海，看起来头发挺多。逻辑电路门的基础课程部分正是EI最吸引我的所在。不错，一点都难不倒我呵呵呵呵。 早上上了逻辑电路门，实物参观了写电子元器件，于是下午的时间就基本用在了设计逻辑电路作业上。一向以为逻辑电路挺简单的我在设计电路这件事上效率呈指数型下降。我开始怀疑，自己是不是究竟真的适合工程专业呢？别人花一点点时间就可以搞定的事情我居然要花一个小时还在研究，真的是不知道在干嘛。下午的special lecture又是关于医学的——论计算机工程在基因识别中的应用。于是乎，再一次加深了JHU医学院超强的印象。至于其他的…… 晚上制定个计划吧。该好好规划时间了，已经差不多1/3的时间过去了哦。

posts.title: June 2nd
posts.text: Wow, already 1/3 of the program has finished. I missed the shopping trip today. My fantastic ASICS is dying, I have wear it for about 10days! Today we have a whole day electronics class & work doing. We have our electronic class in a big lecture hall this morning. There are about 80 people inside of the lecture hall. It is quite big and magnificent. Our lecturer is an Indian-oriented professor, I believe. He is partly bald, as many programmers do. He is very nice, his lecture is actually quite fun because of the funny picture he used like 2-finger-aliens and 8-fingers-cat, which really attracts students. His lecture begun with an introduction of numbers and digital systems. All of these evolve from complicated and primitive system to an easy-to-read and perfect as time goes by. For example, the 2-digit, 8-digit, 10-digit and 16-digit systems. All of them have their own specific characteristics and shows their usage in variety of fields. Old Chinese people use 16-digit weighting systems, computer hardware use binary system to enable computers doing work; 8-digit for bytes and 10-digits in our everyday life. Actually, it is the electronics class that attracts me to this Engineering Innovation Program. I am confident with the logic gates, and the morning introduction courses for the logic gates is OK. However, I am just struggling in the afternoon, the time when we are focusing on dealing with our logic gates assignment. I took nearly an hour with another people’s help to finish question8. That is a shame for me! I am now even having a doubt that am I really good at these things like electrical engineering? Can I be the best among my classmates if I choose electrical engineering in the university? It is just seeming not very possible as I thought before. Today’s special lecture is still something related to medical field. I am just realizing that seems JHU’s Engineering department is just rely on their medical department. Every special lecture related to something about medicine or medical cure. JHU is now out of the dream school list for me. Hurry up tomorrow!

Hello, first day in July. 22th anniversary of Hong Kong backing China. To be or not to be? We have a quiz this morning and a static lecture this afternoon. Static is just so complicated that I still have not figure out about its force experiencing analysis. I just get suck in my quiz. Next time no way to have such a low score.

今天又是很魔幻的一天哦。不知不觉EI已经开始10天了，到美国已经十天了，还有没几天在这里了。早上去组装了logic gate assignment question9要求的CMOS版。同组的日本兄弟设计了一个超级简单只有三个非与门的电路。靠，这么简单为什么我想不到。因为左侧光照传感器对右轮没有控制上的影响（没光空转有光也转）所以三个就可以搞定了。就是我们组装这个CMOS版就居然发了快两个小时，效率小低（全班最慢）。好难弄的CMOS版啊…… 下午去搞定了周一留下的Truss problems（桁架问题）。这个大概就是为了搭意大利面桥做准备吧，让我们先熟悉起来计算方法和模拟器的使用。一开始我发现这个东西有点难，但是当我理解了∑Fx, ∑Fy 和∑总动量等于0这个方法后这个题目不要太简单。只是后来那个模拟器搞得心态有一点小崩。靠，试了三种桁架全部显示（错误：支点太少）。后来发现就是单纯的我的电脑的Chrome搞不定。妈的，害得我差点砸电脑，是Edge拯救了这台电脑啊。终于还是搞定了。 今晚我去了游泳池，遇到了许多猛男。 一个新的游泳运动员每次连续跑100米，这不能让我怀疑他实际上是一名职业游泳运动员。 杰森是我遇到的另一个朋友。 他还在医学校区开设暑期学校。 他说西班牙语是他的第一语言。 从他那里我了解到西班牙语中的蛙泳实际上被称为braza。 我今天游了600米，大约12圈。 除了前两个连续的圆圈，我在1圈1次完成剩余的圆圈。 我现在可以用大约1’38’’完成100米。 这仍然没问题，但比我慢得多。 期待明天的独立日晚上的棒球哦，好歹听懂棒球规则了。

posts.title: July 3rd
posts.text: One day before Independent’s Holiday. It is already 10 days past since I arrived America, arrived LA, arrived Baltimore, arrived JHU Homewood campus! Today we just have such a normal day. We have done our logic gate CMOS plate design this morning and unfortunately our group become the slowest one. We just don’t know why, although one of our team members have designed such an easy circuit that only contain only 3 NAND gates, which is quite easy and really interesting. Basically, his idea is that since whether left sensor detect lights, the right wheel just keeps moving, so only 3 logic gates is enough for controlling all the thing. We have met some problems about CMOS plate, but fortunately we figure out all the problems and it is working finally. We have truss classes this afternoon. Initially we met with Dr. Luana and Mr. Davis at Maryland Hall 201 to solve the problems that we have on Monday’s class. The truss question was quite difficult for me at first, but when I finally got the idea of ∑Fx, ∑Fy and ∑Momentum all equals 0, I found truss questions are actually easy to solve. We then go to Hackerman Hall to do our Bridge (Truss) Designer Tutorial and practice problems. Initially the truss simulator running on Chrome on the laptop that I am using is just totally dead for 3 different bridges. All of them are just showing errors “too few supports …” I was about to get crazy and I want to just throw away that computer. Fortunately, I get everything I want on Chrome. It is so lucky! Someone (Sam) is saying Edge sucks, but what the hell I should take care of. I went to the swimming pool tonight and meet many nice people. A new fish swimmer is running 100m consecutively each time, which couldn’t make me not to doubt that he is actually a professional swimmer. Jason is another friend I meet. He is also having summer school most in Medical Campus. He speaks Spanish as his first language. From him I have learned that the breaststrokes in Spanish is actually called braza. I swam 600m today, about 12 circles. Except for first two consecutive circles, I finished rest of circles when 1 circle 1 time. I can now finish 100m with about 1’38’’. That is still okay, but is much slower than I can. Hope I can get a nice shoe this week!

今天美国独立日，还有古老的阅兵游行。川普还办了一场一个多小时长的演讲，所有这些都在华盛顿我们去过的路上真实的发生着。 当然了，游行里面还有“美籍台湾人”队伍和轮子的队伍。这些都应该是不被允许的。结合同寝室的小哥的认知观来看，“一个中国”概念的宣传仍然继续开展……除了川普哥的演讲和非常少见的美国国庆日游行，也就是在寝室里宅了一天。对了，食堂终于有正宗千岛酱了，感动到哭。 晚上我们去了一个离这里40km远的一个体育馆看球赛。好歹这回我是作为一个粗通规则的人在看比赛。好歹这回是看懂了，穿黑衣服的一队被扁的好惨，一分都没有拿。今天坐在发球线上中轴线的位置，非常舒服。就是搞不到一不小心达到观众席上的纪念球，有一点点遗憾。 Eric的礼物已经买好了哟。 我们碰到了一个中文讲的贼溜的去过中国11次的老外。他说他去的是东北。不管怎么样反正泡妞能力一流，还要到了俺妮儿的微信号，还和她说叫她把他的微信给我。Wtf，这都什么人才。 然后我们就看了一场感觉比在宁波三年除夕夜加起来都要多却在十分钟之内全放完的烟花表演。大概就今年初五财神日凌晨的放炮规模够得上这十分钟吧。烟火超漂亮，比色比高比谁响，只是会吹口哨的这种响法不是很多。我们那边放地上也就一两米高的烟花在这里直接搞得好几楼高。这里晚上雾大的是真的恐怖；混合上烟花的废气，坐在下风口一块的棒球赛观众直接去世。靠，潮潮的火药味真让人难受。 我们今天居然坐着一辆只有开起速度来才有点风的完全没有空调只有两个装饰品一样的电扇的，看起来像是用集卡车头平台改造的校车同情，真的是难为老夫。另外，在回来的时候居然在破烂停车场等了一个小时。本来一切都可以按部就班进行的！ Gowrav说的没错，妈的，乡下看起来就是富人区，治安不错的那种地方。 好歹今天紧赶慢赶以为把所有事情都搞定了，结果发现那条最重要的朋友圈没有发出去。很烦，下回自己搞个微信之类的应用就没那么多事情了。 滚去睡觉了，狗命要紧。现在都五号早上一点了……

posts.title: July 4th
posts.text: Happy July the 4th! Today is US Independent Day。 We have a one day break today and pretty much we just stay at dorm for whole day long. Today there is a parade in Washington; I have seen “Taiwanese”, I have seen “Fa Lungong”, all those things should be banned and blamed. There is also a Trump’s speech given in front of the White House. It was actually quite fun. At night we went to a baseball stadium that is about 40km away from JHU Homewood campus. At there we watched a baseball game. At least this time I know the basic baseball rules when I am watching it! The team with black shirts just been kicked off that the final point is like 14:0. Unfortunately I have never become the lucky guy who caught the baseball flying outside of the court. We watched a sparkling show after the baseball game finished. I believe that this is a tradition for American’s baseball team that arranging a sparkling show after the game finished. The sparkling show is just fantastic that I have never seen so much sparkling in such a short time(10min) for years. We’ve also met an old American who actually went North east part of China for 11 times. He speaks Chinese quite well and he even got the wechat number from my female classmates. I was just shocked by that. We wasted about an hour waiting in the garage while returning back but fortunately I finished all the thing I need at July 4th before 11:59. That is just so cool! I will definitely die in tomorrow’s class. It is already 0:45 now…

眼睛一睁一闭，又一个礼拜过去了。不知不觉，已经要在美国待了两个礼拜了。大概很快就会走上回家的路吧。 今天上午的课程非常的紧张。我们再一次讲到了桁架的问题。然后我发现我还是对总动量等于0这个概念不是很熟悉。于是做题的时候就很挣扎，很纠结。很幸运，问了老师以后还是搞定了。 下午开始搭意大利面桥的模型。我突然发现原来红黑双煞胶水搞到一起会反应的，还特么会放热，差点没把我手烫了。我们的桥模型很优秀，加上的力基本被谢掉了一半。最后的意大利面桥比赛绝对轻松冠军。 晚上又去游泳馆游了泳，这个事情得坚持。今天游了700m，一百米连续自由泳五趟，25m两趟，50m三趟。最快大概100m也就1‘36’‘吧现在。明天我一定可以更快。 明天就要去内港了哟，好激动。

巴尔的摩内港，深远的历史与离海400km的尴尬共存的事实。 今天又是一个休息日。所以，我们就在寝室里躺了一上午，下午去了内港玩，传说中巴尔的摩这个反正让我现在不怎么想逗留的曾任战时首都的城市的精华。我们先去开了小小游览船。虽然不让撞，但是我们还是撞了大概三次，这下只能尴尬而不失礼貌的说sorry了。内港是一个真正意义上的内港，因为距离真正到大西洋上还有大概400公里距离（250英里），赶上北京到济南的距离了。可以看见卸货的邮轮，码头的吊机。白人老夫妇的私人游艇往内港码头一靠就算是停船了，上岸吃点东西。 内港其实没什么好玩的。所谓的航空母舰是一艘18几几年的老船。大概也就海警船可以撑撑门面。Aj13比那天去的鞋店还便宜五十美金，就居然没有老子的码，真的烦。作为有文化的人，我们去了书店买书。我买了一本菲茨杰拉德的《人间天堂》和王尔德的《道林·格雷德画像》。一本书五美元，税费0.3美元。税有6%，还是有一点的。书还算是特价了。同样的，遵循传统的我买了一份巴尔的摩的地图，计算税以后居然要7.4$… 靠，好贵啊。 晚上回来以后还收到cvs边上有人被抢劫的邮件，想想真实恐怖。下回找Tim一起去游泳吧。

posts.title: July5th
posts.text: Almost 2 weeks past spend in EI program!We are still solving truss problems today. The definition and solving method are still quite confusing for me. The definition of truss, total momentum = 0 for solving problem is quite difficult for me. I have asked some questions to Dr. Luana and fortunately I get some basic ideas about how to solve truss problems. We then start to built our model of spaghetti bridge in the afternoon. I just accidentally found that two glues are just reacting and releasing heat after reacting. Our bridge model is quite good, because tension and compression in each “members” are almost halved. I went to swim tonight, as usual. I swam 700m tonight and my fastest 100m is about 1’36’’, this is the recent fastest speed I can reached. Looking forward to tomorrow’s inner harbor trip!

在巴村的第二个但事实上第三个周日。 好无聊啊今天！就是刷刷手机做做作业背背单词。对了，今天去游了个泳，状态再慢慢恢复。虽然跑不到100m就累的喘气，但是今天基本没怎么休息地游了大概1000m哦。等着接下来就该连续游1000m了。今天泳池里有几个游泳超快的白人中年人，感觉到了压力… 需要弥补一下技术了。还有一个老外在游蝶泳（还有一个时不时来一两下蝶泳），超强超酷。靠，第一次看到比我快这么多的人。 今天去honey grow吃的这顿让我意识到了美帝人民的烹饪水平……这么看起来Fresh Food Café还算是美国人里烧得还可以的了。我绝望了。试问一碗甜的红咖喱面，让人怎么下口…就算有酱油，有海鲜酱甚至还有筷子，有什么用嘛？？？ 对了，今天还下了来这里以来的第七场雨。从华盛顿特区的第一场开始，这一周的雷阵雨降雨率好高啊… 只要下雨，必定是雷阵雨。 不说了，明天考试加油。

posts.title: 6th
posts.text: The inner Harbor. The second Saturday in Baltimore (although actually I am only able to enjoy 3 Saturday here, which means a lot time passed!). We simply stayed at our dorm whole morning, and we went to The Inner Harbor in the afternoon. 4 of us travel as a group took a small boat to travel on the water to see the Inner Harbor, which spend us 25$. The Inner Harbor has quite a long history, which can be observed from the old 19th century aircraft carrier mooring inside the Inner Harbor. The Inner Harbor doesn’t have many places to visit or to play. We went to several shoe stores and I found that the same AJ13 is 50$ cheaper at the Gallery than that in the shoe store. I think myself really lucky because I didn’t buy it from shoe store which saves 50$, but the staff says they don’t have my size. What a pity! For other shoes, either too ugly or no my size. We went to a book store then and bought some sale books, which is quite cheap ($5 for 1 book but tax 6%). One is This Side of Paradise and another is the picture of Dorian Gray. Someone get robbed tonight at 840pm near CVS near campus, so scary.

posts.title: July 7th
posts.text: The third whole-day-break. Today is the second Sunday in JHU EI. Actually, today is the third Sunday because I arrive Baltimore on Sunday. Today is so simple that nothing special happen. I swim 1000m today and finish all the things I need to do in 1 hour. That is the only thing a little special and memorable today. Seventh rain also come out today. I have found some men swimming faster than me today!! And one or two of then is swimming in butterfly style, so cool! Preparing for tomorrow’s exam. Good night!

下半程的第一天，开始了。今天是第一个在这里下雨的早上，也是第一个下了半天雨的日子。是的，这是来巴村的第七场雨。今天上午进行了日常的quiz。大概我永远拿不到满分了吧。虽然按照百分比来算似乎还可以（204/220，93%）……其实也不好。大概是差了太久了吧，都不知道考试考95%以上应该是什么感觉了。究竟算是正常发挥还是超神呢。 接下来我们进行了纸捕鼠夹的制作。我看了网上一个视频做的。很遗憾，这个成品的质量很差。因为摩擦力太大的原因，捕鼠夹其实根本没有能够按照设计原理来进行工作。算了，截止时间之前再做一个吧。 下午则是全新的一门课程——finance。这是我们继electronics的大课以后的第二次大课。不过这次也不是很大，因为只有三个section在一起上课。当然了，这和我以为中的finance还是有很大的区别。EI给我最深的印象在于，很多我以为让这个项目看起来的注水点实际上都讲了一些我意想不到的东西。比如说今天下午的finance课，教授介绍了很多种赚取利润的算法。今天下午让我第一次领略到了为什么经济或是说财物这些课程可以被归类于STEM的原因。其本质都是利用一系列的数学推演进行计算而得出的一般性规律：比如市场弹性需求/供给。此外，比如市场的规律属性，价格机制有效性存在的原因等等，无不是通过数学模型的分析计算及逻辑学上的推理而得到的。 Special Lecture讲了有关Hopkins的申请。是的，这个学校超好，有着很高的师生比（师：生1：7）以及相对小的班级（24个人一个班）。这是一个研究强校，虽然只有10%的国际生但却有72%的在读本科生实习率。相当一部分还是带薪实习哦。甚至最多可以申请到10000美金的校外研究经费。土豪的世界，果然不一样。只是SAT的上下四分位数算是很高了（1480-1550），被称为藤校不是没有理由的。但是，Hopkins最大的强势专业生物医学工程，并不是我感兴趣的点，真的好可惜。不然，这真的可以说是一所梦校了。只不过这个治安…虽然前两年学校宿舍有保证然后后两年绝大多数的人住在学校三个街区以内的公寓里，但是巴尔的摩这个城市…我还是希望大学生活多彩一点的。 晚上游泳一口气强加到了1600（100+1500）m, 配速1500m计时35’33’73’’’。但是每一次转身大概是三秒，所以实际游泳时间大概是三十二分半。加油，得把后面的速度提上去，争取明天游进三十分钟哦

posts.title: July 8th
posts.text: First day in the third week. First half day that is rainy, first rainy morning, the seventh rain in Baltimore when I arrived. We have our second quiz today. Unfortunately, I still don’t get a perfect score. Although it shows a good percentage (204/220, 93%), will, actually is not quite good. I have been a bad student for so long time that I have forget whether it is normal and mandatory for me to get a score higher than 95% or it is super good for me. I hope it is not my liit! After the quiz we start to build our paper mousetrap. Unfortunately, mine is not working because of too much friction. Definitely need to get a new model before Friday deadline! We have our first finance class this afternoon, which is also the second big class we have after the electronics lecture. The finance lecture this afternoon actually surprised me because it has a big difference from what I expected to. The deepest impression that EI gave me is that many of courses that previously I thought as a part that the program holders just want us to have some “classes” in this program, like a part to fill out the class schedule. For finance, I have expected to teach us some economic ideas like price mechanisms, Inflation rates or something related to business. However, in the finance class this afternoon, the professor introduced a variety of algorithms to make a profit. All these beautiful and complicated logarithms like the logarithm to get e (natural base number) let me understand why economics and finance courses can be classified as STEM classes. The essence of whether finance, economics or business is a general rule or result gotten as a conclusion that is calculated using a series of mathematical formulas, such as price elasticity of demand/supply. Logic essence of price mechanism and government policies makes all these financial and economical knowledges convincing and looks reasonable. The special lecture held this afternoon is spoken by a counselor, Miss Bianca Decatur, who is responsible for California’s applicant. Yes, this school is sexy and gorgeous, especially for those biomedical applicants. The university has a high teacher-student ratio (teacher: student 1:7) and a relatively small class range like we have in EI (24 people in one class). This is a school that really supports student research. With only 10% of international students in all of the university undergraduates, 72% of the undergraduates get internships when studying in JHU. Someone even gets a paid internship. You can even apply for up to $10,000 in off-campus research funding. The life for undergraduate students in such a rich school is just like a dream. However, the upper and lower quartiles of the SAT that are extremely high (1480-1550). It is not unreasonable to be a partner of Ivy League School for Johns Hopkins University. Unfortunately, Hopkins’s strongest professional, biomedical engineering, is not my point of interest. What a pity. Otherwise, this can really be said to be a dream school for me. I have swum 1600m tonight, which is much longer than I swam previous days. I swam 1500m of 1600m continuously and it takes me about 35’33’’73’’’. Actually, I finished 1500m within 32’30’’ because I need to change my direction (arriving the 2 sides of swimming pool). Each change takes about 3s. I need to hurry up in order to finish 1500m within 30min! Hurry up tomorrow!

第一次差点在上午的课上睡着的一天。今天早上的lecture教授了一些基本的化学常识（比如摩尔质量）。这是为了下午的三个实验做准备的，为了避免有潜在的高中没有选秀化学的同学不会在下午做实验的时候一脸懵逼……所以我们下午的实验一个是测量加热水的时候的热值转换效率，一个蒸馏，还有一个色谱实验……Excuse me？为什么全部都是IG阶段的实验… 继上一次拿到IG computer science的逻辑电路门复习提纲以后，今天我是真的有点心累了… 难道我真的这么差嘛？只配在这么高端的学校，课程和同学一起做这种低端实验吗？最骚的是还很少拿满分… 下午的实验最搞笑的就是煮意大利面和烤意大利面了。Zuck一不小心把一截意大利面丢进了电烙铁和电烙铁下面支架中间的地方，直接把面给烤成金黄（没错，所有亲历者都馋哭了）。一人掰了一小段吃，惊奇的发现味道还可以，还有一点咸咸的像起司一样，真的是太滑稽了。没错，烤的比水煮的好吃到不知道那里去了，因为水煮的只有外面软了，里面还是硬的。最骚的是我们后面准备二次烤制的时候把意大利面烧着了… 于是整个实验室里都散发着意大利面的香味，勾引者每个人肚子里的馋虫。 下午课结束以后好歹是套了一些老师的词。加油，套词的时间不多了，还要争取推荐信呢。下午的special lecture讲了一种发绿光的蛋白质.. 没错，又是生物。教授是一位南亚次大陆的人，这一点从他的脸部特征就可以看出来。同样的，还有他的口音。 晚上又游了1500m。同样的，左腿一游多就开始有一点要抽筋的感觉，真的很恐怖。另外还被隔壁一道的女选手（没错他会不触壁水下换向… 我丢失的技能包！！！）在速度，美感及泳姿的多样性上完虐了。真的伤心。唯一有点欣慰的是今天的手表计时为32’13’’53’’’,比昨天快了三分钟。一天三分钟，追上孙杨不是梦。 差不多是时间滚去睡觉了。

posts.title: July9th
posts.text: The first time that almost fall asleep in a morning lecture!!! This morning‘s lecture is about some basic chemical knowledge (such as molar mass). This is for the three experiments we need to do in the afternoon. In order to avoid potential students who do not choose chemistry in their high school among my classmates. Otherwise, they may have no idea of the experiments in the afternoon. The thing is, all 3 experiments in the afternoon is everything in an IGCSE chemistry book: measuring time and temperature rise of heating water in order to get efficiency of heating water in that pot, a distillation experiment, and a chromatographic experiment…Excuse me? Why are all experiments in the IGCSE level? In the summer of the second year at high school, I am now doing the experiment I should do in year 1, which made me feel embarrassed. We accidently roasted and cooked some spaghetti this afternoon. The roast one that is accidently made by Zachary is actually quite good. It tastes a little salty and it taste similar to a cheese! We separate the spaghetti and eat it. All of my classmates think that one is actually delicious. Ethen try to produce more after finish the experiment, but he just gets messy (spaghetti get burned slightly). That is just unfortunate! I finally have a relatively long talk with Fr. Shaffer. Hurry up, I need to catch up more this kind of chance to let her know me deeper. Today’s special lecture is about some green proteins… Actually, biology again. So shame for me because I don’t really interest in biology! I swam 1500m tonight, as usual. Same as yesterday, when I had swum 600m (even earlier than yesterday, and there is a little cramping feeling at 1000m yesterday), the left leg starts to have a feeling of cramping, which scares me a lot. I am afraid to use my left leg in the remaining part while I am afraid to use my right leg much stronger than left leg, which is ugly! Tonight, I was totally being defeated by a female swimmer next door (she can switch directions underwater!) Whether the swimming speed, style beautifulness and swimming style (standard action while switching between freestyle / breaststroke / butterfly / backstroke naturally and smoothly. Even worse for me is that she swam a lot faster than me whenever using what styles! I am so sad.) I felt so sad tonight. The only thing that made me happy tonight is: According to timing on my watch, I swam 1500m within 32’13’’53’’’ tonight, which is three minutes faster than yesterday! If I can boost up three minutes every day I swam, it seems that catching up with Sun Yang’s World record is not a dream for me (oh no man stops gossiping and swim within 30 minutes next time before building up such an impossible task). HaHa, I am just joking. I hope that I will not be sleepy on tomorrow’s lecture! Good night!

posts.title: my first article
posts.text: This is my first blog. The blog site now seems messy and easy. Obviously currently the blog site doesn’t have much functions. I will try my best in the future to make my blog looks more friendly and have ore functions. The blog is powered by this useful module, or let’s say this platform is such a useful tool. The light effect it provides is my favorite. I am Kevin from Hangzhou Foreign language school. I am a student who is keen on automobile engineering, especially in car networks. I am also interested in Computer science, which is why I made this blog. In the future, I will post some of my learnings and academic writings on this blog. 第一篇在自己搭建的博客上po的博客，总共花了两个晚上。现在的博客还有很深的模板痕迹。当然，我会一点点的把这些bug都填上。 Oh ♂ Yeah.

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
2019/3/13 Here is a test article for forming qrcode Download link for IMG_2340.jpg
